TestCase.author: Noname
TestCase.Description: Create Item of Item Type ItemTypeForAdmin, created in 'Setup Test.xml' as Innovator Admin

Request.Comments: Create a new item of ItemTypeForAdmin item type as Innovator Admin. You can explicitly specify runAs attribute to run as Innovator Admin: <Request runAs="admin:innovator"> Or you can ommit the 'runAs' attribute and leave Request element empty, because request uses Innovator Admin credentials by default.
